attributes.action: Stop the unhygenic unlicenced tattooing from private houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the unhygenic unlicenced tattooing from private houses by people who have no idea about hygene and are known to tattoo children under the age of 18 years (Tattooing of minors act 1969)all studios are licenced so when are the government going to licence home workers and stop this dirty process it is only a matter of time before a serious hepatitis or similar disease outbreak will start

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
